pageContext.claim: “The biggest loophole drawing illegal aliens to our borders is the use of fraudulent or meritless asylum claims to gain entry into our great country. An alien simply crosses the border illegally, finds a Border Patrol agent, and using well-coached language -- by lawyers and others that stand there trying to get fees or whatever they can get -- they're given a phrase to read. They never heard of the phrase before. They don't believe in the phrase. But they're given a little legal statement to read, and they read it.”
pageContext.analysis: There is no magic phrase. An immigrant simply must request asylum for U.S. officials to consider the merits of the case. That's the law, not a loophole, and it covers immigrants who crossed legally or illegally into the United States.
